mapper.sql: USER_ID, LONGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, FULL_NAME, CTIME, IS_ENABLED, IS_DELETED, POV_CODE, PHONE_NUM, EMAIL
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_USER (USER_ID, LONGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, FULL_NAME, CTIME, IS_ENABLED, IS_DELETED, POV_CODE, PHONE_NUM, EMAIL) values (#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{longinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{povCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into SYS_USER
USER_ID,
LONGIN_NAME,
PASSWORD,
FULL_NAME,
CTIME,
IS_ENABLED,
IS_DELETED,
POV_CODE,
PHONE_NUM,
EMAIL,

mapper.update:
update SYS_USER
LONGIN_NAME = #{longinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTIME = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_ENABLED = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POV_CODE = #{povCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHONE_NUM = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_USER set LONGIN_NAME = #{longinName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTIME = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_ENABLED = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, POV_CODE = #{povCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHONE_NUM = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
